channel.title: How i change the emotes like yes no and more
channel.description:
Yeah. i just made my skillcape-emotes for deltascape. But how i make it in the emote-box.
My ocmmand is: ::skillcapez to do the emote. But how would i make it for the emote-box thingy?
-DELTASCAPE BASE =DELTASCAPE BASE @DELTASCA{E BASE

item.title: How i change the emotes like yes no and more
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

That’s right, you have to add it yourself.

c.sendQuest("text", lineNumber);

Read full topic
item.source: How i change the emotes like yes no and more
